entry.summary: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 40 mph with gusts to 70 mph. * WHERE...Shishmaref and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKDT Monday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property

entry.title: Winter Storm Warning issued October 23 at 2:24AM AKDT until October 23 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM AKDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Strong winds, heavy snow and periods of low visibility. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Kivalina and Red Dog Dock.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued October 23 at 3:38AM EDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...HIGH FIRE DANGER CONDITIONS THIS AFTERNOON FOR NORTHWEST GEORGIA DUE TO LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITIES... Relative humidity values of 25 percent or less are possible for 4 or more hours this afternoon over parts of northwest Georgia. Winds will be east to southeast at up to 10 mph. With dry fuels, high fire danger conditions can be expected.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Catoosa; Chattooga; Dade; Floyd; Gordon; Murray; Polk; Walker; Whitfield
